publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2055# Mike Rumbles: Domestic Abuse Services for All Victims—That the Parliament recognises the very serious and totally unacceptable problem of domestic violence in Scottish society; notes in particular that all victims, whether they be women, men or children, need to be supported, and therefore considers that the Scottish Executive should provide practical help and assistance to all such victims. Supported by: George Lyon*, Jeremy Purvis*, Donald Gorrie*, John Farquhar Munro*, Mr Keith Raffan*
S2M-2055# Domestic Abuse Services for All Victims (lodged on 23 November 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mike Pringle*, Eleanor Scott*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*
S2M-2055# Domestic Abuse Services for All Victims (lodged on 23 November 2004) Murdo Fraser*, Margaret Mitchell*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Dr Jean Turner*

S2M-2055# Mike Rumbles: Domestic Abuse Services for All Victims—That the Parliament recognises the very serious and totally unacceptable problem of domestic violence in Scottish society; notes in particular that all victims, whether they be women, men or children, need to be supported, and therefore considers that the Scottish Executive should provide practical help and assistance to all such victims. Supported by: George Lyon, Jeremy Purvis, Donald Gorrie, John Farquhar Munro, Mr Keith Raffan, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mike Pringle, Eleanor Scott, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Bruce McFee, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Murdo Fraser, Margaret Mitchell, Mr Brian Monteith, Dr Jean Turner
S2M-2055# Domestic Abuse Services for All Victims (lodged on 23 November 2004) Mr David Davidson*
